original_text: And he carried away all his cattle, and all his goods which he had gotten, the cattle of his getting, which he had gotten in Padanaram, for to go to Isaac his father in the land of Canaan.
korean_text: 그 모은 바 모든 가축과 모든 소유물 곧 그가 밧단아람에서 모은 가축을 이끌고 가나안 땅에 있는 그의 아버지 이삭에게로 가려 할새

sentences.original_text: And he carried away all his cattle,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 모든 가축을 데리고 갔고,

sentences.original_text: and all his goods which he had gotten,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 얻은 모든 재물을 데리고 갔는데,

sentences.original_text: which he had gotten in Padanaram,
for to go to Isaac his father
